name: Negroni
about: Legend has it that the Negroni was invented in Florence, Italy in 1919 when Count Camillo Negroni asked the bartender to strengthen his Americano by replacing the soda water with gin.
instructions: Add all ingredients to a mixing glass with ice
Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice
notes: A well-made Negroni is perfectly balanced between sweet, bitter, and strong. Some modern variations substitute the gin with other spirits like bourbon (Boulevardier) or mezcal (Smoky Negroni).
